channel.title: A few questions about how Jagex does things
channel.description:
How does Jagex: (all referring to 377 and before)
Store the height values of each vertex in each tile in the landscape? like is it <0, 1, 0, 1> or something?
Store animations? How do they make it so that no matter what armour you are wearing, the vertices in the armour move with the player.

item.title: A few questions about how Jagex does things

Store animations? How do they make it so that no matter what armour you are wearing, the vertices in the armour move with the player.

Read full topic
